title: What kind of course should I choose after 12th if I am a PCM student who is average in maths and physics but good in chemistry? - Quora

response.answer_text: I suggest not to do Btech in this case . You can go for defence servies or you can do BCA since it is the era of computers . Or you could go for BSC . Chemistry teachers are less these days so you can do BSC . After BSC you can go in research or teaching profession. BA is also an option. BArch or architecute is a good option but it requires interest in maths. My choice would ne BCA or BSC.
Average maths is sufficient. U can boost to high level easy. Maths can be bent to any line it is the special quality. Do BSc Maths , (MPC )or BSC Chemistry ( CPM)
